title: Customer Complaint Procedure En
text:
None
1. Purpose This procedure defines how FinSight Bank handles customer complaints in accordance with the Central Bank of Tunisia’s directives on client protection. Its purpose is to ensure fair, transparent, and timely responses to any complaint related to banking products or services.

title: Customer Complaint Procedure En
text:
None
2. Principles FinSight Bank’s complaint management is based on accessibility, transparency, impartiality, and traceability.

title: Customer Complaint Procedure En
text:
None
3. Channels for Submitting Complaints 1. In Branch: submit a written complaint to your advisor. 2. By Email: complaints@finsightbank.tn with full name, ID, and contact. 3. By Mail: FinSight Bank – Customer Relations Department, 12 Rue du Lac, Les Berges du Lac, Tunis 1053. 4. Online Form: www.finsightbank.tn/complaints 5. Mobile App: under “Support” → “Submit Complaint”.

title: Customer Complaint Procedure En
text:
None
4. Acknowledgement and Processing Clients receive an acknowledgement within 48 hours. The Bank resolves complaints within 15 working days. If further analysis is needed, the client is informed of the new deadline.

title: Customer Complaint Procedure En
text:
None
5. Investigation and Resolution Complaints are analyzed by the Customer Relations Department with the relevant branch. Clients receive a written response summarizing the outcome. If unsatisfied, clients may request a review by the Compliance Department.

title: Customer Complaint Procedure En
text:
None
6. Escalation and External Mediation If unresolved after 30 days, clients may contact the Central Bank of Tunisia – Customer Protection Department or the Financial Sector Mediator, providing all prior correspondence.

title: Customer Complaint Procedure En
text:
None
7. Confidentiality and Data Protection All complaints are confidential. Data collected are used only for complaint management and processed in compliance with the Information Security and Data Protection Policy and Tunisian Law No. 2004‑63.

title: Customer Complaint Procedure En
text:
None
8. Monitoring and Continuous Improvement Complaint statistics are reviewed quarterly by the Risk and Compliance Committee and audited annually by Internal Audit.

title: Customer Complaint Procedure En
text:
None
9. Contact Information Customer Relations Department Phone: +216 71 000 123 Email: complaints@finsightbank.tn Website: www.finsightbank.tn/complaints
